#summary BloomImage works with BloomDevice to fit images to a mobile device.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

BloomImage implements template tags that work with BloomDevice to generate images that fit mobile devices.

For example:

{{{
{% load deviceimage %}
{% deviceimage "image.jpg" 75x75 as image %}
<img src="{{ image }}" width="{{ image.width }}" height="{{ image.height }}" />
}}}

----

= Installation Overview =

  * Install BloomDevice
  * Install the [http://effbot.org/zone/pil-index.htm Python Imaging Library] (PIL)
  * Install `[http://code.google.com/p/sorl-thumbnail/ sorl-thumbnail]`
  * Add `bloom.image` to `INSTALLED_APPS`
  * Load the `device_image` tag library in a template and use the `device_image` tag
  uses Sorl Thumbnail 

----
